mapper.select: select * from (select *from( select TMP.*, rownum rn from( select * from( select mem_no,mem_login_date from mem where 100>=(select count(*) from review) minus select active_mem_no, sysdate as mem_join_date from follow ) order by mem_login_date )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 3) R left outer join mem M on R.mem_no=M.mem_no order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
